definitions.title: Qal 1. a.
definitions.body: smoke, Pf. 3 ms. ´[[ע]] of mt. Ex 19:18, so Impf. 3 mpl. [[יֶעֱשָָׁנוּ]] (at touch of ´[[י]]) Ps 104:32 Ps 144:5.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fig., 3 ms. ´[[יֶעְשַׁן אַף־י]], c. [[ב]] against, De 20:19, Ps 74:1. Hence
subj. pers., fume, i.e.be wroth, Pf. 2 ms. ´[[עָשַׁנְתָּ בּ]] Ps 80:5.
